name: Dinosaur Sniper Shooting Simulation 3D Pro: Hunting Game Pro
name_original: Dinosaur Sniper Shooting Simulation 3D Pro: Hunting Game Pro
description:
Here is Start your Most exciting Dino hunting journey.
lets you see amazing meat-eating dinosaurs in action and challenge them for ultimate survival!
completely true to life and totally breathtaking adventures Acton Activity.
Makes it a must have game on all your IOS devices.



HOW TO PLAY:

◆ look around in all the corners and uncover all the dino
◆ Tap Shoot button to Hunt the Dinosaur.
◆ Tap Zoom button to See the Clear view of Dinosaur.

GAME FEATURES:

◆ Simulated 3D Dinosaur.
◆ Enjoy Thrill with Hunting Dinosaur views.
◆ The attractive game play.
◆ Fun packed game for all ages.
◆ Involving game play. Beautiful eye looking 3D environment.
◆ Ultra Realistic, Efficient and Perfect Game Play.
◆ High Quality (HD) graphics.
◆ Realistic to life sound effects.
◆ Significant Characteristic.
◆ No connectivity required while playing.
